definitions.title: vb. Denom. Pō‘
definitions.body: . gatherstubble;—Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְקשְׁשׁוּ]] Ex 5:7; Inf. cstr. [[לְקשֵׁשׁ]] v:Ex 5:12; Pt. [[מְקשֵׁשׁ]] Nu 15:32, Nu 15:33, f. [[מְקשֶׁשֶׁת]] 1Ki 17:10, 1Ki 17:12;—gather stubble, c. acc. cogn. [[קַשׁ]] Ex 5:12 ([[לַתֶּבֶן]]); also c. acc. [[תֶּבֶן]] v:Ex 5:7 (both J); c. acc. [[עֵחִים]] as firewood Nu 15:32, Nu 15:33 (P) 1Ki 17:10, 1Ki 17:12.
